title: Gay as Blazes
description: Gay as Blazes follows the lives of five gay friends.
quote: Hopefully one day he’ll come to his senses and realize his time could be spent in so many more productive ways, like joining our gay men’s reading group.
altHero: a table of men toast wine glasses
alt1: two men talk at the dinner table
alt2: a man is incredulous, looking at two others
alt3: two men talk to a third, younger man on a couch
